title: Tender for the Supply of Sterile Surgical Gloves Latex, Confirming to BS (4005) 1996 for single use, size 7 - 9,300,000 pairs
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender to the lowest responsive bidder, on the recommendations made by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), at a total cost of US $1,785,600.00 (LKR 196,365,287.10), was approved by the Cabinet.
